channel.title: SFoL 54: Ultimate Pick 2 (16/18) D2 | CANNED
channel.description:
![image|571x495](upload://zXoWk5Ww4BWiRCSv0EjtAceEYLu.jpeg)
# Rules
1. Follow the Global Forum Rules 2. If you haven’t posted content in 36 hours, you’ll be prodded for inactivity. If you don’t respond to that prod in 12 hours, you will be force replaced. 3. No private messaging others in the game about the game. 4. Do not quote private host messages 5. Don’t throw the game. This includes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 6. Refrain from posting so many times in a row. 7. Players are not allowed to use big letters. These are reserved for the host. 8. You are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you a temporary blacklist meaning you can’t join a forum of lies for a while. Further leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 9. Lets all have fun and play together! 10. Do not edit or delete made posts. 11. Do not like posts in a thread if you are dead in that game.
# Special Mechanics
*You think I put effort into this? Hah!* THIS SETUP IS P DAMN CLOSED I WILL ANNOUNCE IG EFFECTS WHEN RELEVANT
# Rolelist
*Only god knows what abomination will you guys create*
Good faction - They targeted gamers Evil faction - Kai_5 Third Party - Obama
# Playerlist
1. Luxy 2. Arete 3. Monokuma 4. Blizer 5. KyoDaz 6. PoisonedSquid :crown: 7. JakeTheWolfie 8. Maxwell :crown: 9. H_Hja 9. Frost 10. Simon 11. MaximusPrime 13. PokemonKidRyan 14. BlueStorm 15. Boss 16. SirDerpsALot 17. Marshal 18. Shurian
# Backups
* DatBird * WazzaAzza

item.title: SFoL 54: Ultimate Pick 2 (16/18) D2 | CANNED
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
Hja

They targeted gamers Special
Spam (Passive) - You must post at least 50 times per day phase. If you do not, you will die. You are immune to negative effects from players you post more than during the first three nights. If you hammer an evil, you will be revealed as a They targeted gamers.

Suggest gamebreaking effect that I didn’t include in the setup because holy fuck I want this game to be at least somewhat playable (Day) - Create an alternate reality. Choose up to 9 players to add to it. The effect will end at the end of the following night. – 1 Use

Bastard (Night) - Ask a mechanical question pertaining to the game. You will receive only incorrect answers. – Infinite Uses

Defeat Kai_5 and any harmful Obama.

Professor Layton

They targeted gamers Investigative
Dimensionally displaced (Passive) - You join the game on d2. If you hammer a good, you will be informed of 4 host-chosen players, at least one of which is a Kai_5.

Incredibly interesting third ability name (Day) - Keep watch over a player. If they ever leave their room, you will know. - Infinite Uses
Observe (Day) - You will know if your target uses any day abilities today. - Infinite Uses

Study (Night) - Learn who visits your target tonight. If there are any negative effects on the target, you will know (offensive/frames/killing/conversion). – Infinite Uses

Defeat Kai_5 and any harmful Obama.

Magnus, the Fisherman

They targeted gamers Killer
Not host but host related passive (Passive) - You have a private neighborhood with the host of the game. If you hammer an evil player, you may force a player to target you tonight. You will attack them at the end of the night.
Racism (Passive) - If you kill a They targeted gamers with any of your abilities, you will be unable to use any abilities for the rest of the game.

Skewer (Day) - Cause a player to bleed. Violently. - 4 Uses
Distract (Day) - Prevent a player from using day abilities today. - 1 Use

Assassinate (Night) - Kill a player who voted the king during the last phase - 2 Uses
Nightshade (Night) - Make a player believe they were bled. - Infinite Uses

Defeat Kai_5 and any harmful Obama.

Read full topic

Prior Investigation (Night) - Gain a use in Court Mandate – Infinite Uses
Court Mandate (Night) - Gain a use in Formal Investigation – 1 Use
Formal Investigation (Night) - Determine a player’s role name and alignment. – 0 Uses
